entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XXHash64/32 incorrect one-shot implementation #61878
  • Avx2.AlignRight does not generate VPPALIGNR intrinsic #61877
  • [API Proposal]: Please add a method to the C# library to copy a directory with all its contents #61873
  • Hot Reload doesn't work with x64 builds #61870
  • JsonSerializerOptions constructor is not copying the context #61869
  • Move libraries shims under src/native #61864
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator results in a compile error with a List<> of enums with a JsonConverter #61860

Closed

  • HTTP/2 request does not work on Windows 7 #61866
  • Improve/cleanup RyuJIT's IR handling of operand lists #11058
    Future
  • Data loss in BrotliStream with CompressionLevel.Optimal #61872
  • HttpClient with proxy throws when BadGateway #61835
  • Configure Area Pod Triage board for Eric / Jeff #61829
    Future
  • Add test to prevent removal of display debugger type #23710
    Future
  • XslCompiledTransform fails on high number of xsl:when elements #25077
    Future
  • Consider adding Span<char> overloads to TextEncoder #25091
    Future
  • Improve XML testing and fuzzing. #28251
    Future
  • WriteSurrogateCharEntity reversing chars in surrogate pairs? #28255
    Future
  • [arm64] Test failed: System.Xml.Tests.CNameTableTestModule.RunTests #12602
    Future
  • Specify for which URL component to encode in DefaultUrlEncoder #29845
    Future
  • DataSet.ReadXmlSchema throws XmlSchemaException if a table namespace is specified #29903
    Future
  • Shift-JIS Encoding throws 'System.NotSupportedException' in BodyName #33979
    Future
  • XslCompiledTransform Transform exception XNodeNavigator.MoveToNext(XPathNodeType type) #34808
    Future
  • XslCompiledTransform in .NET Core does not support the Load(type) #34821
    Future
  • Misleading exception when processing of included XSD fails #36923
    Future
  • Unexptected result with EUC-JP encoding #39161
    Future
  • Add XmlSchema.ReadAsync #41252
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not explicitly pass type to `VNForMapStore` #61882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix XXHash for stripe size #61881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete dead code from `InferStructOpSizeAlign` #61880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to Microsoft.Extensions libraries #61867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • Add performance portion of android startup scenario #61861

Merged

  • Do not devirtualize when optimizations disabled #61868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    * NO SQUASH *, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use reflection or a compile-time only shim assembly to reference unexposed corelib types. #61802
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    * NO SQUASH *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests for AOT #61803
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor to allow OSR to switch to optimized #61851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1479484 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
    area-Infrastructure
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Test chromebug #61856
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Default BuildTargetFramework to NetCoreAppCurrent for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource #61760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Force console #61854
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal] Compiler generated `IEnumerator` implementations should be `struct` sometimes #57903
  • Should the comment TODO behavior be changed? #57899
  • Naming Style using underscore multiplies underscore #57896
  • Debugger crashes while trying to access a multidimensional array by executing the code step by step #57895

Closed

  • ServiceHub CoreCLR is failing to load sqlite dlls. #57827
    17.1
  • Simplify member access (IDE0002) code style rule suggestion generates broken code #56882
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Search less files when searching in global suppressions. #57890
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify sqlite authoring now that we're 64bit only #57836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix add-braces crash in top-level #57835
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: factor binding logic #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57897
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57822
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57905
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57904
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make GetDocumentWithFrozenPartialSemantics asynchronous #57830
    Area-IDE
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Properly support TableEntryNavigateEventArgs.ShouldActivate #57889
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider Razor Analyzer which Recommends `InvokeVoidAsync` instead of `InvokeAsync<object>` #38549
  • Model validation for non-nullable array elements #38548
  • OpenAPIReference does not work for SDK generators that create C# output in a folder #38547
  • Blazor Webassembly Brotli and Gzip compression on IIS not working #38546
  • Can't launch Kestrel if the startup takes 'long' time in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 6 #38544
  • Unskip `IdentityUIScriptsTest` on macOS 10.15 #38542
  • partial tag helper content not rendered in asp.net core 6 hosted in IIS 10 #38541

Closed

  • Dynamically managed authentication / authorization #38099
  • Access token exhaustion when using client credentials flow #38297
    Discussions
  • Design issues on Registration/Login pages in Angular SPA template #36750
    Discussions
  • Allow custom blazor endpoint url #38545
  • GRPC Web does not pass cookies #38500
  • VS Code Tooling Issue #38103
  • InvalidOperationException on POST of form with large data #38462

PullRequests

Merged

  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Added ResourcesAssembly property to LocalizationOptions to set different Assembly for localization resources. #28972
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package update fails for non Android projects #3490
  • Grid with auto row and column not rendering child Frame with correct height on iOS when child has a margin #3489
  • Grid with auto row and column not sizing correctly on Windows when child has a margin #3488
  • Context Action Command not running on Windows App #3486
  • Fresh MAUI project failing to deploy #3485

PullRequests

Created

  • Add extension to add an IView to a GridLayout at specific column/row #3484

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3483
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • Added dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use implicit usings #26773
    MQ
  • Use file scoped namespaces #26772
    MQ
  • Add-Migration : Exception calling "Start" with "1" argument(s): "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform." #26770

Closed

  • Update fwlink owners #22467
    7.0.0
  • Update raw SQL docs to point to conceptual documentation showing examples #19987
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • File scoped namespaces and implicit usings for EFCore project #26774
  • Code cleanup for tests #26771
  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769

Merged

  • Reference conceptual docs for examples #26759
  • Expression bodies for query test base classes #26761
  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: Add multiple parameters if inferred type mapping differs #26582
  • Query: Fix double negation in SQL generation #26734
    auto-merge
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
